about_the_game: Play as the last cadet himself, Flash Pan, as he tries to get into the workshop through the library in order to get his tools. He'll need the tools to repair the only mini-sub left on the submarine. You'll start with the upgraded lighting system for improved lighting range. You can find the flare gun, harpoon gun, and shotgun as you encounter jellyfish, electric eels, and sharks. There's a built-in speedrun timer too! We're holding a speedrun challenge every month while the full game is nearing completion for a November/December release. Follow us on Twitter for more details on the speedrun challenge and updates on The Last Cadet - @gamesbydebonair

content_descriptors.notes: Some violence and gore. Some profanity.

name: The Last Cadet Demo
short_description: Play as the titular character, Flash Pan, as he searches the submarine for items he'll need to fix the only mini-sub left on the submarine. It's the only way out but will he survive long enough to carry the plan out?
